file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-23-02-04 - BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE CARTRIDGE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE CARTRIDGE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the cartridge of the baggage-compartment fire-extinguisher bottle. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE-EXTIN- CLASS-C BAGGAGE 26-23-02-000-801-A GUISHER-BOTTLE CARTRIDGE - RE- COMPARTMENT MOVAL BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE-EXTIN- CLASS-C BAGGAGE 26-23-02-400-801-A GUISHER BOTTLE CARTRIDGE - INSTAL- COMPARTMENT LATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-23-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-23-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 2. BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE-EXTINGUISHER-BOTTLE CARTRIDGE - REMOVAL A. General (1) To do the task, refer to the instructions in Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 and Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION BAGGAGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLES - RE- AMM TASK 26-23-01-000-801-A/400 MOVAL Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 - Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the electronic compartment 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the fire-extinguisher bottles ( AMM TASK 26-23-01-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 26-23-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A WARNING: THE CARTRIDGES ARE EXPLOSIVE DEVICES. ACCIDENTAL DETONATION OF A CARTRIDGE CAN CAUSE INJURY. DURING THE TASK, OBEY ALL SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN THE PACIFIC SCIENTIFIC CMM. (1) Remove the cartridge. Refer to the last revision of the Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 (for high rate bottle) and Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 (for metering bottle). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 26-23-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-23-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: CLASS-C BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 3. BAGGAGE-COMPARTMENT FIRE-EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE CARTRIDGE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To do the task, refer to the instructions in Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 and Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION BAGGAGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLES - INSTAL- AMM TASK 26-23-01-400-801-A/400 LATION Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 - Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Electronic compartment D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Electronic compartment I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A WARNING: THE CARTRIDGES ARE EXPLOSIVE DEVICES. ACCIDENTAL DETONATION OF A CARTRIDGE CAN CAUSE INJURY. DURING THE TASK, OBEY ALL SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN THE PACIFIC SCIENTIFIC CMM. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) Install the cartridges. Refer to the last revision of the Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-46 (for high rate bottle) and Pacific Scientific CMM ATA 26-23-47 (for metering bottle). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the baggage fire extinguisher bottles (AMM TASK 26-23-01-400-801-A/400).
